page.title: 07MURLEY FARM
page.content: Murley farm is quite special because as well as it being one in the set of three, they are run by the four Branton brothers. Rodney Branton,the oldest brother,looks after Lower Murley,while Michael Branton looks after Higher Murley and Alan Branton is in charge of the dairy unit at Hills Farm.The youngest brother,Andrew,lives and farms with his parents,Mr.& Mrs.Frederick Branton,at Locks Farm,Whitnage. Murley Farm grows Barley & Wheat in the Winter & Summer, they own 4 dogs over 100 sheep and lambs and a lot of cattle. Murley Farm has the distinction of being in the original Domesday Survey
